results.name: Partial sums of (-1)^n*F(n-1).
comment: Diagonal sums of Riordan array (1/(1-x), x/(1+x)), A112468.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,-1).
maple: a[0]:=1:a[1]:=1:a[2]:=2:a[3]:=1:for n from 4 to 50 do a[n]:=2*a[n-2]-a[n-3] od: seq(a[n], n=0..42); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 04 2008
